page.title: 05Students
page.content: Many people come to Eastbourne to learn the English language. There are classes throughout the year, but especially in the summer. Students come from many countries including Europe, the Middle East, China and South America. The students spend their morning in school from about 9:15-12:00 a.m. and they spend most of their afternoons sight seeing. They stay as paying guests with local families. There are about a dozen language schools in Eastbourne. The most popular are the Language Tuition Centre and European Friends. Students also travel on outings to learn about English culture. A two week course costs about Â£100.
